name: Freeway Document
summary: Learn about .FREEWAY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The FREEWAY document does not contain the actual resources used by your site but rather the site layout and links to the different properties. The website resources and pages are saved in the "Media" and "Site Folder" folders, which are located in the same folder as the FREEWAY file.
You can export the site contained in your FREEWAY document to a variety of formats including HTML, JPEG, GIF, PNG, and BMP.

description: A FREEWAY file is a settings information file created and used by the Freeway Pro software, a WYSIWYG app on MacOS for creating websites. It contains information about a website such as siteâ€™s appearance and layout including font, background appearance, margins, and links to resources that are loaded at runtime. This information is used for creating website that has the layout and arrangement of UI elements as per the information in the file.

Website document created and used by Freeway Pro, an OS X WYSIWYG app used to create websites; stores information about a website, such as the site's appearance and layout; includes font, background appearance, margins, and links to resources.
